description: 5 sheets framed separately: sheet I: skeleton with flesh head turned to PR; frame with square in each corner; sheet II: large head; in smaller frame without squares; sheet III: tree; frame with squares in each corner; sheet IV: skeleton with flesh head turned to PL; in smaller frame without squares; sheet V: headless female with arms crossed; frame with square in each corner
dimension:
70 7/8 x 24 1/4 in. (180.02 x 61.6 cm) (sheet, sheet I)
70 7/8 x 25 1/4 in. (180.02 x 64.14 cm) (sheet, sheet II)
70 7/8 x 24 1/4 in. (180.02 x 61.6 cm) (sheet, sheet III)
70 7/8 x 23 5/8 in. (180.02 x 60.01 cm) (sheet, sheet IV)
70 7/8 x 24 1/2 in. (180.02 x 62.23 cm) (sheet, sheet V)
73 7/8 x 27 1/4 in. (187.64 x 69.22 cm) (outer frame, sheet I)
73 7/8 x 28 1/2 in. (187.64 x 72.39 cm) (outer frame, sheet II)
73 7/8 x 27 1/2 in. (187.64 x 69.85 cm) (outer frame, sheet III)
73 7/8 x 26 5/8 in. (187.64 x 67.63 cm) (outer frame, sheet IV)
73 7/8 x 27 1/2 in. (187.64 x 69.85 cm) (outer frame, sheet V)
medium: Heliorelief, woodcut and spit-bite etching with hand coloring and sanding
title: The Foreign Plowman
